about_the_game:
Does your game need special tiles for its holiest spaces? This cathedral tileset has all the pews, altars, sculptures and stained glass your saints could ask for!

Ground tiles:

* Water, grass and dirt
* concrete path (with optional grass edge)
* stone path (with optional grass edge)
* wood plank floor (with optional grass edge)
* more wood flooring
* multiple stone floors
* wedding table
* fences
* tall grass
* flower petals
* and more!

Wall tiles:

* plain stone
* Victorian-inspired
* lots of upper roof edges
* black marble wall
* hedges with and without flowers!

Other tiles featuring:

* pews
* church organ
* fancy doors
* 16 stained glass pieces (with night/day variations)
* sculptures
* lots of architecture pieces
* and more!

Wedding:

* decorative plants and topiaries
* white sashes and curtains
* lots of white flowers
* pedestals
* decorated altar
* arbor (with and without decorations)
* gazebo (with and without decorations)
* place settings for table
* chairs
* cake and candles
* and more!

Events and Animations:

* Small treasure box
* Large and small animated doors

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
